name: Vermont Flight Academy
about: Vermont Flight Academy is Vermont's premier full-service flight school, dedicated to providing high-quality flight instruction to both novice and experienced pilots. Founded to promote general aviation, we offer a comprehensive range of training programs, including Private Pilot License, Instrument Rating, Commercial Pilot License, Multi-Engine Rating, and Certified Flight Instructor certifications. Our expert instructors and meticulously maintained, modern fleet of aircraft ensure a safe and enjoyable flying experience. With top-notch facilities and a commitment to excellence, we help pilots achieve their aviation goals and soar to new heights. Join us to embark on your aviation journey.
